sections.heading: Pharmaceutical preparedness: Definitions
sections.text: Transfer or distribution of drugs, controlled substances or medical devices during emergency.Section 28-32a. - Pharmaceutical preparedness: Inventory report. Confidentiality of information. Regulations. Penalties.
